meanings.sent1: I accidentally overfill my cup with water and it spilled everywhere.
meanings.sent2: The gas tank can overfill if you keep pumping after it clicks off.
meanings.sent3: I didn't mean to overfill the bathtub, but now the floor is all wet!
meanings.sent4: Her heart seemed to overfill with joy when she saw her long-lost friend.
meanings.sent5: The excitement overfilling the room was palpable as the surprise was revealed.

meanings.sent1: The trash can overfills quickly if we don't empty it often.
meanings.sent2: The river can overfill its banks during heavy rainstorms.
meanings.sent3: The balloon started to overfill and then popped with a loud bang!
meanings.sent4: Her schedule tends to overfill with appointments, leaving no time for relaxation.
meanings.sent5: The feeling of contentment can overfill your heart when you spend time with loved ones.
